GSD.product_version: versions from v4.20 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ARM: OMAP2+: Fix refcount leak in omapdss_init_of

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 507159facf002d113c4878fec67f37d62f187887, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit e0c827aca0730b51f38081aa4e8ecf0912aab55f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ARM: OMAP2+: Fix refcount leak in omapdss_init_of
